channel.title: Altirra update feed (release channel)
channel.description: Automatic update notifications for release versions of the Altirra emulator.

ul.li: New cartridge types: Williams 16K, JRC RAMBOX, MDDOS, COS 32K, Pronto, and CAR types 76/78-93/160.
New device support: 1400XL/1450XLD modem and disk drive, 835/1030 full emulation, SIDE 3.1, SuperSALT Test Assembly, MIDIMATE/serial over TCP/IP, Chalk Board PowerPad, Stack Lightpen.
UI: Display pan/zoom, new command line switches, improved pad input, improved save state support in many devices, screen reader support.
Debugger: Write-only register readback, improved source debugging support, improved memory window, trace save/load in the performance analyzer.
Accuracy improvements to cartridge cassette tape, CPU, device, disk, video, POKEY, network, and VBXE emulation.
AltirraOS updated to 3.41 with fixes for type 4 polling, keyboard handling, interrupt support, math pack, screen device, and SIO.
